biography_text: ZELDIN, Lee M, a Representative from New York; born in East Meadow, Nassau County, N.Y., January 30, 1980; graduated from William Floyd High School, Brookhaven, N.Y., 1998; B.A., State University of New York, Albany, N.Y., 2001; J.D., Albany Law School, Albany, N.Y., 2003; United States Army, 2003-2007; United States Army Reserve, 2007-present; lawyer, private practice; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress in 2008; member of the New York state senate, 2011-2014; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: State University of New York, Albany, N.Y.
